textBox.richText: The MOBIO team was showing the Mobile Biometry demonstrators at a booth during the Biometric 2010 exhibition in London. Also we had the opportunity to present Mobile Biometry at the conference itself during a session on MOBIO featuring: Person authentication using face and voice on a mobile phone: From research to reality Sébastien Marcel, Senior Researcher, Idiap Research Institute, FP7 MOBIO project coordinator, Switzerland MOBIO: Technical challenges on mobile devices Markus Turtinen, CEO, Visidon Mobile biometry: Strengthening the weakest link  José Luis Huertas Fernández, CEO, Mobbeel
